name: pfxwrdsymb
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cword(c1)), wcel(co(c0, cpfx, c2), cword(cima(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2)))))

stmt.origin: eqeltrd(co(c0, cpfx, c2), cword(cima(c0, co(nat0, cfzo, c2))), co(c0, csubstr, cop(nat0, c2)), wcel(c0, cword(c1)))

⊢ (c0 ∈ Word(c1)→(c0[prefix]c2)∈ Word((c0 "(0[..^]c2))))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Word(c1)→(c0[prefix]c2)=(c0[substr]< 0, c2 >))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Word(c1)→(c0[substr]< 0, c2 >)∈ Word((c0 "(0[..^]c2))))
